ValidationRule.description:
If the MDU Lead status is one of the following, it will throw an error:
Rejected - Disqualify Rejected - Return to Nurture Stream Transferred from Small Business Transfer to Small Business
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "MDU_Lead", IsConverted = True, OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Rejected - Disqualify"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Rejected - Return to Nurture Stream"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Transferred from Small Business"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Transfer to Small Business") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Rejected or Transferred Leads can not be converted. Please update the Lead Status to the appropriate one and retry converting. Lead Error x01.
